errors.channel_is_limited_access: The user has no access to the channel. This is only applicable to private Salesforce record channels.
errors.method_not_supported_for_channel_type: This type of conversation cannot be used with this method.
errors.missing_scope: The calling token is not granted the necessary scopes to complete this operation.
errors.too_many_members: The membership in the channel has exceeded our maximum member limit. No more users can join the channel.
